Scene:
Kikyo Field
(Kikyōgahara / 桔梗原)

Play: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (本朝廿四孝)

Production: October 1975

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
